author: wn.com
title: Chiefs Pledging Support For Prez Mahama Are Happy For The Hardships In Brong Ahafo - NPP Reg. Youth Organizer
text: Brong Ahafo Regional Youth Organizer of the opposition New Patriotic Party ( NPP ), Kwame Bafo has pooh-poohed the Chiefs of Sunyani , Goaso and Dormaa all in the Brong Ahafo region for canvassing for votes for President Mahama in the next
